Text.Page:
Gulas may be bad, but sometimes their pets are worse.

Stupid things. Get rid of the {@LinkCreature:8#2061#auric imps} and {@LinkCreature:8#2011#armored hyenas}.

One less thing for us to worry about.
Glad they're dead. Now we can concentrate on the gulas themselves.
No time for imps and hyenas? If a hyena starts sniffing at your corpse, your ghost is gonna hope someone else has time for imps and hyenas!
